item.title: Cameron appeals to Boris Johnson not to join Brexit camp
item.description:
PM tells London mayor ‘linking arms’ with Nigel Farage and George Galloway on EU referendum would be wrong for UK


David Cameron has intensified the pressure on Boris Johnson by asking him to avoid “linking arms” with Nigel Farage and George Galloway in backing a British exit from the EU.

As the London mayor prepares to announce his intentions on the EU on Sunday night, the prime minister warned that a UK exit would only offer an “illusion of sovereignty”.

Continue reading...
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Watt Chief political correspondent
